name: PurchaseDomain
description:
Facilitates the purchase of a specified domain.

Call this tool to purchase a domain through Vercel's new domain acquisition endpoints.

parameters.name: domain_purchase_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details for domain purchase, including `name`, `expectedPrice`, `renew`, and registrant information like `country`, `firstName`, `lastName`, `address1`, `city`, `state`, `postalCode`, `phone`, and `email`.

expectedPrice.description: The price you expect to be charged for the purchase.

renew.description: Indicates whether the domain should be automatically renewed.

country.description: The country of the domain registrant

orgName.description: The company name of the domain registrant

firstName.description: The first name of the domain registrant

lastName.description: The last name of the domain registrant

address1.description: The street address of the domain registrant

city.description: The city of the domain registrant

state.description: The state of the domain registrant

postalCode.description: The postal code of the domain registrant

phone.description: The phone number of the domain registrant

email.description: The email of the domain registrant

parameters.name: team_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the team to perform the domain purchase request.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: team_slug
parameters.description: The slug representing the team to perform the purchase on behalf of. This identifies the team within Vercel.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the vercel API.

parameters.name: teamId
parameters.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team identifier to perform the request on behalf of.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

value_schema.description: The Team slug to perform the request on behalf of.

expectedPrice.description: The price you expect to be charged for the purchase.

renew.description: Indicates whether the domain should be automatically renewed.
